name: Claude Code
description: Claude Code is Anthropic's official CLI tool that helps users with software engineering tasks. This LXC includes Claude Code, claude-nine, and 5 MCP servers for enhanced development capabilities.

notes.text: SSH access is enabled by default. Connect using: ssh dev@<IP-ADDRESS>
You need an Anthropic API key to use Claude Code. Get one from https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
First-run configuration wizard will help you set up your API key and MCP servers
Includes claude-nine for enhanced command line interfaces and 5 MCP servers (Supabase, DigitalOcean, Shopify, Puppeteer, Upstash)
